GamblerMod:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
GamblerMod:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

GamblerMod:Advance.NAME: Cash Advance
GamblerMod:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

GamblerMod:AllIn.NAME: All In
GamblerMod:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You cannot gain Block from cards next turn.

GamblerMod:Gamble.NAME: Risky Investment
GamblerMod:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold.

GamblerMod:Advantage.NAME: Gain Advantage
GamblerMod:Advantage.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Advantage for each *Die in your hand.
GamblerMod:Advantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 *Advantage for each *Die in your hand.

GamblerMod:CursedDie.NAME: Cursed Die
GamblerMod:CursedDie.DESCRIPTION: 1/6 chance to permanently remove a *Cursed *Die from your deck when played. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:SunkCost.NAME: Sunk Cost
GamblerMod:SunkCost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Permanently increase this card's Block or damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
GamblerMod:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Ethereal.
GamblerMod:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.

GamblerMod:RedKing.NAME: Red King
GamblerMod:RedKing.DESCRIPTION: *Red *Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Add !M! *Red *Dice to your hand.

GamblerMod:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
GamblerMod:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in hand by 1 this turn.
GamblerMod:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in hand by 1 this turn. NL (Up to 2)

GamblerMod:DoubleDealing.NAME: Double-Dealing
GamblerMod:DoubleDealing.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:FatesHand.NAME: Fate's Hand
GamblerMod:FatesHand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

GamblerMod:TrickstersMark.NAME: Trickster's Mark
GamblerMod:TrickstersMark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

GamblerMod:LuckyBreak.NAME: Lucky Break
GamblerMod:LuckyBreak.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gain !M! Dexterity.

GamblerMod:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
GamblerMod:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you end your turn with !B! or less block, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

GamblerMod:ChaosFour.NAME: Chaos Die
GamblerMod:ChaosFour.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:ChaosFive.NAME: Chaos Die
GamblerMod:ChaosFive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact and 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:ChaosSix.NAME: Chaos Die
GamblerMod:ChaosSix.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! cards this turn are played twice. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
GamblerMod:ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

GamblerMod:Fold.NAME: Fold
GamblerMod:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn. NL

GamblerMod:LuckOfTheDraw.NAME: Luck of the Draw
GamblerMod:LuckOfTheDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, randomly gain 1 Block or deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

GamblerMod:CardShark.NAME: Card Shark
GamblerMod:CardShark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0 and deals double damage.

GamblerMod:BlazingTactics.NAME: Blazing Tactics
GamblerMod:BlazingTactics.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . If you have more energy than cards in hand, draw !M! cards. Otherwise, Exhaust.

GamblerMod:Call.NAME: Call
GamblerMod:Call.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Attack: deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Skill: apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Power: gain [E] [E].
GamblerMod:Call.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Attack: deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Skill: apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Power: gain [E] [E] [E].

GamblerMod:Bluff.NAME: Bluff
GamblerMod:Bluff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have no debuffs, gain !B! Block.
GamblerMod:Bluff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have 1 or less debuffs, gain !B! Block.

GamblerMod:FoolsFortune.NAME: Fool's Fortune
GamblerMod:FoolsFortune.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no Attacks in hand, gain !M! Block and [E] next turn.

GamblerMod:DeadlyWager.NAME: Deadly Wager
GamblerMod:DeadlyWager.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. At the start of your turn, lose 3 HP

GamblerMod:StrategistsShield.NAME: Strategist's Shield
GamblerMod:StrategistsShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Strength for each Power in hand.
GamblerMod:StrategistsShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Strength for each Power and Status in hand.

GamblerMod:Rig.NAME: Rig
GamblerMod:Rig.DESCRIPTION: Cards in your draw and discard pile cost 0 until played this turn. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust

GamblerMod:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot
GamblerMod:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If this is the only card in your hand, draw !M! cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:HeartOfTheCards.NAME: Heart Of The Cards
GamblerMod:HeartOfTheCards.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw that many cards minus one and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
GamblerMod:HeartOfTheCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw that many cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:StackedDeck.NAME: Stacked Deck
GamblerMod:StackedDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, set the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.
GamblerMod:StackedDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, set the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

GamblerMod:HitAndRun.NAME: Hit and Run
GamblerMod:HitAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal double damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.

GamblerMod:MaxedOut.NAME: Maxed Out
GamblerMod:MaxedOut.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:CoinBarrage.NAME: Coin Barrage
GamblerMod:CoinBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 12 times. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

GamblerMod:PokerFace.NAME: Poker Face
GamblerMod:PokerFace.DESCRIPTION: In 2 turns, set your health to its current value. NL Exhaust.
GamblerMod:PokerFace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In 2 turns, set your health to its current value.

GamblerMod:Misplay.NAME: Misplay
GamblerMod:Misplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal 2 damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random other character.

GamblerMod:LongGame.NAME: Long Game
GamblerMod:LongGame.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable until turn !M!. NL Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

GamblerMod:HighRoller.NAME: High Roller
GamblerMod:HighRoller.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you roll a *Six, draw a card.
